對細緊無性趣


英撚正選中堅都唔要 唔識貨

Phil Jones has welcomed the prospect of rivalling new signing Victor Lindelof for a place in the Manchester United first team next season.

The Swedish international officially completed a £30.7m move to Old Trafford on Wednesday, signing a four year deal with an option of a further year.

His arrival seemingly signals the end of Chris Smalling‘s Man United career, with Jose Mourinho reportedly willing to offload the Englishman this summer to make way for Lindelof.

And Jones, reacting to United’s latest arrival, noted that he always welcomed the emergence of new competition at Old Trafford.

“We’re Manchester United, we’re going to attract the best players and the biggest players,” Jones said.

“It would be a strange summer if we weren’t signing players like that. Competition is always good.

“I’ve spoken to the manager (Jose Mourinho). He just asks how you’re feeling, how you’re doing – just a normal conversation between player and manager.

“He’s a good man-manager, he’s like that with all the players.”

It was thought last summer summer that Jones, who hadn’t featured since January 2016 at the time, would spend the 2016/17 on the periphery under Mourinho or perhaps even at another club.

By November, however, he had asserted himself as a mainstay in the starting XI after evoking a measure of grittiness and discipline that served him so well under Sir Alex Ferguson. His superb form, alongside that of Marcos Rojo, convinced Mourinho to hold fire on signing Lindelof last January, and supporters will be keen to see how he fares with the 22-year-old now in the mix at Old Trafford.

Victor Lindelof became Manchester United's first official summer signing, which prompted interesting social media activity from Ousmane Dembele.

The Swedish defender was unveiled as a United player after agreeing personal terms and undergoing a medical at the clubs training complex, Carrington. United have reportedly splashed out in excess of £30 million to acquire his services from Benfica.

Following his signing, Jose Mourinho remains hellbent on continuing his summer spurge by drafting in more talent. Alvaro Morata appears to be edging closer with the Portuguese also eyeing up Ivan Perisic, among others.

And despite claiming he was content at his current club Borussia Dortmund, Dembele has filled the United faithfuls with hope following the Tweets he 'liked' on social media.

He then also 'liked' the post from the player confirming his switch to United.

葡萄牙報章周五爆出，效力皇家馬德里的基斯坦奴朗拿度（Cristiano Ronaldo）因被馬德里檢察官起訴逃稅而決意離開西班牙，甚至已跟皇馬高層談判——西班牙《馬卡報》稍後確認該報道屬實。雖然C朗去年才與皇馬簽下新合約，但報道指，目前在俄羅斯出戰洲際盃的他，返回西班牙後就會著手處理轉會。機會來了，曼聯！ C朗加盟皇馬前曾效力紅魔6個球季，助球隊3奪英超，亦曾在歐聯登頂，而C朗本人亦憑在紅魔的出色表現而贏得金球獎，因此當他決意離開西班牙的消息一傳出，一班紅魔球迷就在社交媒體表現得相當興奮，紛紛呼籲C朗「回家」。 @MufcFlash表示：「回來你的家曼聯吧！」@Stephiono有相同意見：「朗拿度希望離開馬德里……回家吧…」@TheManUtdWay亦稱：「幾可肯定，若然C朗回歸曼聯，Twitter將會陷入瘋狂狀態。」 C朗離開皇馬，阿仙奴都有希望？廠迷@umohini1就呼籲愛隊出手：「向朗拿度開價，辦妥一切吧。」看到部分廠迷如此痴心妄想，亦激起魔迷的「抽水心」。@Shihab06就一句說中廠迷的死穴：「雲加離開阿仙奴的機會比朗拿度離開皇馬大。」@rishta_mufc同樣一針見血：「阿仙奴贏英超冠軍的機會比朗拿度離開皇馬大。」
